update.description:
An attempt to fix object deletion on exit, starting with Scene. 

The changes ensure that all references to a scene shared pointer are cleared and the scene destructor is called. 

Manually starting and quitting gazebo with an empty world confirmed this and I added a MainWindow test that verifies the shared pointer `use_count` just before exiting the test case.
update.title: Delete scene on exit

content.raw:
I think I just found a fix for `TimePanel_TEST` (not backportable because `TimePanel::Visibility is not in gazebo5). I'll make another PR after I test some more.

(There's a child branch of this one with the fix in [scene_destructor_timepanel](#!/osrf/gazebo/branch/scene_destructor_timepanel) if you want to check it out)
content.html:
I think I just found a fix for TimePanel_TEST (not backportable because `TimePanel::Visibility is not in gazebo5). I'll make another PR after I test some more.

(There's a child branch of this one with the fix in scene_destructor_timepanel if you want to check it out)

content.raw:
* [UNIT_GLWidget_TEST backtrace](https://gist.github.com/scpeters/115a92195f2b77415f11)
* [UNIT_GLWidget_TEST2 backtrace](https://gist.github.com/scpeters/8306e59f9e40ecfa39b9)
* [UNIT_JointMaker_TEST backtrace](https://gist.github.com/scpeters/aab8602d00c62bcd94b1)

They all point to [rendering::Camera::Fini at line 217](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/46ded1b92e196c8ffc2f7db7ff2fb72975dacba0/gazebo/rendering/Camera.cc?at=scene_destructor#cl-217) and fail in `Ogre::RenderTarget::fireViewportRemoved`
content.html:
• UNIT_GLWidget_TEST backtrace
  • UNIT_GLWidget_TEST2 backtrace
  • UNIT_JointMaker_TEST backtrace

They all point to rendering::Camera::Fini at line 217 and fail in Ogre::RenderTarget::fireViewportRemoved

content.html: UNIT_GLWidget_TEST, UNIT_GLWidget_TEST2, and UNIT_JointMaker_TEST are now failing for me.

content.raw:
~~Selection test passes, am now getting:  FAIL!  : MainWindow_TEST::CopyPaste() 'modelVisClone != NULL' returned FALSE. ()~~

I'd made a change to UserCamera that was causing this crash and forgot about it... all test pass for me now! `TimePanel_TEST::Visibility` is still broken, don't know if it's related to this PR necessarily.
content.html:
Selection test passes, am now getting: FAIL! : MainWindow_TEST::CopyPaste() 'modelVisClone != NULL' returned FALSE. ()

I'd made a change to UserCamera that was causing this crash and forgot about it... all test pass for me now! TimePanel_TEST::Visibility is still broken, don't know if it's related to this PR necessarily.

content.raw: I guess more effort is needed to close issue #1261. I will continue the hunt for the main window test failure bug.
content.html: I guess more effort is needed to close issue #1261. I will continue the hunt for the main window test failure bug.

content.raw: some places rely on the fact `Fini()` is called in Node's destructor which is called when the shared pointer's ref count drops to 0 on `node.reset()`. Here I'm just being more explicit and calling `Fini()` to clean it up. We currently don't have dangling shared pointer problems with node so I think both approaches are fine
content.html: some places rely on the fact Fini() is called in Node's destructor which is called when the shared pointer's ref count drops to 0 on node.reset(). Here I'm just being more explicit and calling Fini() to clean it up. We currently don't have dangling shared pointer problems with node so I think both approaches are fine
